Message:
My family lived in hiding deep
within the snowy mountains.

For my sister and I,
who had become witches,
living deep in the forests
of the desolate mountains
provided the perfect
hiding place.

I learned how to survive as
a hunter from my grandfather...
and the laws of nature.

In order to live,
we must sacrifice
the lives of others.

Even if that means...
taking the lives
of the innocent.

On the list I’d been given,
there were six witches’ names—
the lives I was to take
in exchange for my sister’s.

If I killed those six witches,
my sister would be
returned to me.

That’s what the Inquisition
had told me.
